alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 23 at 2:27AM CDT until April 23 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 AM CDT FOR BEAVER...EASTERN TEXAS...LIPSCOMB...HUTCHINSON...HANSFORD... SOUTHEASTERN SHERMAN...ROBERTS...HEMPHILL...OCHILTREE AND EASTERN MOORE COUNTIES... At 226 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Liberal to 6 miles west of Boyd to Fritch, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Borger, Guymon, Perryton, Spearman, Lipscomb, Canadian, Beaver, Miami, Fritch, Sunray, Hooker, Stinnett, Booker, Gruver, Tyrone, Forgan, Follett, Higgins, Optima and Darrouzett. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
